title: Is Dilmun the Garden of Eden? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. After the flood the whole world changed. This includes a great deal of the earth, which is why we have earthquakes and such. The earth is trying to get back to the state it was in when God created it. he did not make the earth unstable so earthquakes, volcanoes, Hurricanes, etc would harm the earth or man. It was perfect then and not today. Eden is long gone.

I am writing (that I will never finished) titled: “The Bible According To Harold”. According to my interpretations of the Bible the answer is no. However, they were in the geographic location of each other. I wrote a book titled “Crazy Old Man”. There you can take the forgoing “With a grain of salt.” Harold
